attributes.description: Welcome page with golden paths, quick reference, and navigation links
attributes.panelsJSON:
[{"type": "visualization", "embeddableConfig": {"savedVis": {"title": "", "description": "", "type": "markdown", "params": {"fontSize": 12, "openLinksInNewTab": false, "markdown": "# 🚀 Elastic Sandbox

Your **fully configured local Elastic Stack** — ready for development, debugging, and testing.
Everything runs in rootless Podman containers with one-command startup.

|  |  |  |  |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|
| ⚙️ **Design & test** Logstash pipelines | 🔔 **Build alerting** rules → Mattermost | 🔍 **Explore data** in Discover | 🔐 **Test RBAC** with sample users |

👇 Follow a **golden path** below to get started, or jump straight to the apps."}, "uiState": {}, "data": {"aggs": [], "searchSource": {"query": {"query": "", "language": "kuery"}, "filter": []}}}, "enhancements": {}}, "panelIndex": "p-hero", "gridData": {"i": "p-hero", "x": 0, "y": 0, "w": 48, "h": 7}}, {"type": "visualization", "embeddableConfig": {"savedVis": {"title": "", "description": "", "type": "markdown", "params": {"fontSize": 12, "openLinksInNewTab": false, "markdown": "## 🔑 Credentials

| | User | Password |
|:---:|------|----------|
| 👑 | `elastic` | `changeme` |
| 👤 | `analyst` | `password` |
| 🔧 | `logstash` | `password` |

---

## 🌐 Services

| | Service | Port |
|:---:|---------|:----:|
| 🟢 | [Elasticsearch](http://localhost:9200) | `9200` |
| 🟢 | [Kibana](http://localhost:5601) | `5601` |
| 🟣 | [Mattermost](http://localhost:8065) | `8065` |
| 🟠 | Logstash API | `9600` |

> 💬 Mattermost admin: `admin` / `Admin123!`"}, "uiState": {}, "data": {"aggs": [], "searchSource": {"query": {"query": "", "language": "kuery"}, "filter": []}}}, "enhancements": {}}, "panelIndex": "p-creds", "gridData": {"i": "p-creds", "x": 0, "y": 7, "w": 12, "h": 16}}, {"type": "visualization", "embeddableConfig": {"savedVis": {"title": "", "description": "", "type": "markdown", "params": {"fontSize": 12, "openLinksInNewTab": false, "markdown": "## ⚙️ Golden Path: Logstash Pipelines

*Design, deploy, and monitor pipelines — all local.*

---

**① Launch** the stack
```
podman compose -f install/compose.yaml \
  --env-file install/local/.env \
  --profile kibana --profile logstash up -d
```

**② Write** a `.conf` file in `logstash/pipelines/`

**③ Deploy** via `deploy-logstash-pipelines.sh`
or [Pipeline Management →](/app/management/logstash/pipelines)

**④ Monitor** on the [📊 Logstash Dashboard](/app/dashboards#/view/f8a015a7-5bdf-489a-8db4-19944db6be5c)

**⑤ Debug** — error panels · DLQ metrics · [Discover](/app/discover)

**⑥ Iterate** — edit → redeploy → watch ♻️

---

📖 [**See the full guide →**](/app/dashboards#/view/dev-guide-00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002)"}, "uiState": {}, "data": {"aggs": [], "searchSource": {"query": {"query": "", "language": "kuery"}, "filter": []}}}, "enhancements": {}}, "panelIndex": "p-logstash", "gridData": {"i": "p-logstash", "x": 12, "y": 7, "w": 18, "h": 16}}, {"type": "visualization", "embeddableConfig": {"savedVis": {"title": "", "description": "", "type": "markdown", "params": {"fontSize": 12, "openLinksInNewTab": false, "markdown": "## 🔔 Golden Path: Alerting & Mattermost

*Define rules, ship notifications to chat channels.*

---

**① Launch** the stack
```
podman compose -f install/compose.yaml \
  --env-file install/local/.env \
  --profile kibana --profile mattermost up -d
```

**② Auto-setup** — teams, `elastic-alerts` channels, webhooks ✨

**③ Write** a `.alert` JSON file
(reference: `logstash-heartbeat.alert`)

**④ Deploy** via `deploy-kibana-alerts.sh`

**⑤ Verify** in [💬 Mattermost](http://localhost:8065) (`admin` / `Admin123!`)

**⑥ Iterate** — refine Mustache templates ♻️

---

📖 [**Full guide + Mustache reference →**](/app/dashboards#/view/dev-guide-00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000003)"}, "uiState": {}, "data": {"aggs": [], "searchSource": {"query": {"query": "", "language": "kuery"}, "filter": []}}}, "enhancements": {}}, "panelIndex": "p-alerting", "gridData": {"i": "p-alerting", "x": 30, "y": 7, "w": 18, "h": 16}}, {"type": "visualization", "embeddableConfig": {"savedVis": {"title": "", "description": "", "type": "markdown", "params": {"fontSize": 12, "openLinksInNewTab": false, "markdown": "## 🧭 Navigate

### 🔍 Explore
| | App | |
|:---:|-----|---|
| 🔎 | [**Discover**](/app/discover) | Search & filter log data |
| 📊 | [**Dashboards**](/app/dashboards) | All dashboards |

### 🛠️ Manage
| | App | |
|:---:|-----|---|
| ⚙️ | [**Logstash Pipelines**](/app/management/logstash/pipelines) | Centrally-managed pipelines |
| 🔄 | [**Ingest Pipelines**](/app/management/ingest/ingest_pipelines) | ES ingest pipelines |
| 📋 | [**Data Views**](/app/management/kibana/dataViews) | Index patterns & formatters |
| 🔔 | [**Alerting Rules**](/app/management/insightsAndAlerting/triggersActions/rules) | Rule management |
| 🔌 | [**Connectors**](/app/management/insightsAndAlerting/triggersActionsConnectors/connectors) | Mattermost, email, etc. |

### 📈 Monitor
| | App | |
|:---:|-----|---|
| 💚 | [**Logstash Monitoring**](/app/dashboards#/view/f8a015a7-5bdf-489a-8db4-19944db6be5c) | Pipeline health · errors · DLQ |"}, "uiState": {}, "data": {"aggs": [], "searchSource": {"query": {"query": "", "language": "kuery"}, "filter": []}}}, "enhancements": {}}, "panelIndex": "p-apps", "gridData": {"i": "p-apps", "x": 0, "y": 23, "w": 24, "h": 14}}, {"type": "visualization", "embeddableConfig": {"savedVis": {"title": "", "description": "", "type": "markdown", "params": {"fontSize": 12, "openLinksInNewTab": false, "markdown": "## 📚 Spaces & Resources

### 🏠 Kibana Spaces

| | Space | Purpose |
|:---:|-------|---------|
| 🟦 | [**Default**](/app/home) | Main workspace — this landing page |

> ➕ Create more via [Space Management](/app/management/kibana/spaces)

---

### 🔗 External Resources

| | Resource | |
|:---:|----------|---|
| 🐙 | [**GitHub**](https://github.com/nouknouk/elastic-sandbox) | Source code · README · Issues |
| 📘 | [**Elastic Docs**](https://www.elastic.co/docs) | Official documentation |
| 📗 | [**Kibana Guide**](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/kibana/current/index.html) | Kibana reference |
| 📙 | [**Logstash Ref**](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/logstash/current/index.html) | Pipeline configuration |"}, "uiState": {}, "data": {"aggs": [], "searchSource": {"query": {"query": "", "language": "kuery"}, "filter": []}}}, "enhancements": {}}, "panelIndex": "p-spaces", "gridData": {"i": "p-spaces", "x": 24, "y": 23, "w": 24, "h": 14}}]
attributes.title: Developer Landing Page
